sentence: While doxxing underage girls is apparently par-for-the-course for Sims, it doesn’t fit into Josh Shapiro’s clean-cut formula for winning election in November.
author: Matthew J. Brouillette
title: Matthew J. Brouillette: Josh Shapiro’s Lt. Governor problem

sentence: An ad by Rep. Brian Sims seeking the Democratic nomination for Pennsylvania lieutenant governor this year drew a complaint Friday, April 15, 2022 and a sharply worded letter from Josh Shapiro, the party’s presumed nominee for governor.
author: Philadelphia Sun Staff
title: Shapiro: Dem candidate’s ad wrongly implies endorsement

sentence: Then he sued the Little Sisters of the Poor, or forced them to sue him when he wanted them to foot the bill for someone else’s birth control, and I realized that Josh Shapiro was willing to do anything to curry favor with the most radical wing of his party.
author: Christine Flowers
title: Christine Flowers: Neither Sims nor Shapiro deserve to be in public office
